languages.text: "Также позвольте напомнить — нам все так же недостает людей в команде. И мы не отыскали Хейнрикса ван Калокса, правую руку Лорд-инквизитора. Человека, что растворился в тенях звездной системы — как мы теперь точно знаем, не на станции Эурак-V. Учитывайте это при составлении дальнейших планов".

traits.locale_text: "Также позвольте напомнить — нам все так же недостает людей в команде. И мы не отыскали Хейнрикса ван Калокса, правую руку Лорд-инквизитора. Человека, что растворился в тенях звездной системы — как мы теперь точно знаем, не на станции Эурак-V. Учитывайте это при составлении дальнейших планов".

languages.text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor — as we can now attest, the man vanished into the shadows of the star system, and was not present on Eurac V. We must keep this in mind when making any future plans."
languages.original_text: "Также позвольте напомнить — нам все так же недостает людей в команде. И мы не отыскали Хейнрикса ван Калокса, правую руку Лорд-инквизитора. Человека, что растворился в тенях звездной системы — как мы теперь точно знаем, не на станции Эурак-V. Учитывайте это при составлении дальнейших планов".

traits.locale_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix von Calox, the right hand of Lord Inquisitor — the person who vanished in the shadows of the star system, but not on Eurac-V as we now can attest. Keep this in mind when making your future plans."

"With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix von Calox, the right hand of Lord Inquisitor — the person who vanished in the shadows of the star system, but not on Eurac-V as we now can attest. Keep this in mind when making your future plans."

"With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix von Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor — as we can now attest, the man vanished into the shadows of the star system, and was not present on Eurac V. Keep this in mind when making any future plans."

"With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor — as we can now attest, the man vanished into the shadows of the star system, and was not present on Eurac V. We must keep this in mind when making any future plans."

"With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor — as we can now attest, the man vanished into the shadows of the star system, and was not present on Eurac V. We must keep this in mind when making any future plans."

languages.text: « Si je puis me permettre, j'aimerais vous rappeler que nous sommes toujours en quête de plusieurs membres d'équipage. De plus, nous n'avons pas encore localisé Heinrix van Calox, le bras droit du seigneur inquisiteur. Comme nous pouvons maintenant en attester, il a disparu dans les zones d'ombre du système stellaire et ne se trouvait pas sur Eurac-V. Nous devons y penser dans nos recherches futures. »
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor — as we can now attest, the man vanished into the shadows of the star system, and was not present on Eurac V. We must keep this in mind when making any future plans."

traits.locale_text: « Si je puis me permettre, j'aimerais vous rappeler que nous sommes toujours en quête de plusieurs membres d'équipage. De plus, nous n'avons pas encore localisé Heinrix van Calox, le bras droit du seigneur inquisiteur. Comme nous pouvons maintenant en attester, il a disparu dans les zones d'ombre du système stellaire et ne se trouvait pas sur Eurac-V. Nous devons y penser dans nos recherches futures. »

languages.text: "Mit Eurer Erlaubnis möchte ich Euch auch daran erinnern, dass uns noch Männer und Frauen für die Crew fehlen. Und wir haben Heinrix van Calox noch nicht aufgespürt, die rechte Hand des Großinquisitors. Wie wir inzwischen wissen, ist der Mann in den Schatten des Sternensystems verschwunden und war nicht auf Eurac V. Daran sollten wir bei unseren Planungen denken."
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor — as we can now attest, the man vanished into the shadows of the star system, and was not present on Eurac V. We must keep this in mind when making any future plans."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Eurer Erlaubnis möchte ich Euch auch daran erinnern, dass uns noch Männer und Frauen für die Crew fehlen. Und wir haben Heinrix van Calox noch nicht aufgespürt, die rechte Hand des Großinquisitors. Wie wir inzwischen wissen, ist der Mann in den Schatten des Sternensystems verschwunden und war nicht auf Eurac V. Daran sollten wir bei unseren Planungen denken."

"Mit Eurer Erlaubnis möchte ich Euch auch daran erinnern, dass uns noch Männer und Frauen für die Crew fehlen. Und wir haben Heinrix van Calox noch nicht aufgespürt, die rechte Hand des Großinquisitors. Wie wir nun wissen, ist der Mann in den Schatten des Sternensystems verschwunden und war nicht auf Eurac V zugegen. Bedenkt das, wenn Ihr über Eure nächsten Schritte entscheidet."

languages.text: «Con su permiso, también querría recordarle que seguimos necesitando más mujeres y hombres a bordo. Y todavía no hemos encontrado a Heinrix van Calox, la mano derecha del Lord Inquisidor. Como hemos podido confirmar, ha desaparecido en las sombras del sistema estelar, y no estaba presente en Eurac V. Debemos tenerlo en cuenta al elaborar planes futuros».
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor — as we can now attest, the man vanished into the shadows of the star system, and was not present on Eurac V. We must keep this in mind when making any future plans."

traits.locale_text: «Con su permiso, también querría recordarle que seguimos necesitando más mujeres y hombres a bordo. Y todavía no hemos encontrado a Heinrix van Calox, la mano derecha del Lord Inquisidor. Como hemos podido confirmar, ha desaparecido en las sombras del sistema estelar, y no estaba presente en Eurac V. Debemos tenerlo en cuenta al elaborar planes futuros».

languages.text: “如果您允许，我还想提醒您，我们需要更多的船员。我们还没有找到大审判官的得力助手海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯。现在我们可以确定，此人依然隐藏在星系的阴影之中，并不在欧拉克五号星站上。未来在制定计划时，请务必牢记这一点。”
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor — as we can now attest, the man vanished into the shadows of the star system, and was not present on Eurac V. We must keep this in mind when making any future plans."

traits.locale_text: “如果您允许，我还想提醒您，我们需要更多的船员。我们还没有找到大审判官的得力助手海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯。现在我们可以确定，此人依然隐藏在星系的阴影之中，并不在欧拉克五号星站上。未来在制定计划时，请务必牢记这一点。”

languages.text: 「よろしければ、性別問わず、まだクルーが必要だという事を改めて言及させてください。そして、ロード・インクィジターの右腕であるハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスも、未だ行方不明のままです。彼はユーラック・Vにはおらず、この星系の闇へと姿を消したのです。今後の計画を立てる際はこの事を念頭に置いてください」
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor — as we can now attest, the man vanished into the shadows of the star system, and was not present on Eurac V. We must keep this in mind when making any future plans."

traits.locale_text: 「よろしければ、性別問わず、まだクルーが必要だという事を改めて言及させてください。そして、ロード・インクィジターの右腕であるハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスも、未だ行方不明のままです。彼はユーラック・Vにはおらず、この星系の闇へと姿を消したのです。今後の計画を立てる際はこの事を念頭に置いてください」

languages.text: "İzninizle size ayrıca mürettebatımız için hâlâ yeni insanlar arayışında olduğumuzu da anımsatmak isterim. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun sağ kolu Heinrix van Calox'un da yerini henüz tespit edemedik. Artık kesin bir dille konuşabiliriz ki kendisi yıldız sisteminin gölgelerinde kayboldu ve Eurac V'te değildi. Gelecek planlarımızı yaparken bunu da göz önünde bulundurmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still in need of more men and women for the crew. And we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor — as we can now attest, the man vanished into the shadows of the star system, and was not present on Eurac V. We must keep this in mind when making any future plans."
